title: Cranberry and orange shortbread biscuits
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '225g butter, softened', '100g icing sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '1 tablespoon grated orange zest, or more to taste', '250g dried cranberries, chopped']
